Steredenn is officially available on PC/Mac/Linux

Steam, Itch.io and Humble Bundle

01 oct. 2015

Hello!

It took time, but yep. Steredenn is out in the wild.

It costs $12.99 (-15% for the launch week). It’s available on Steam, Itch.io and via an Humble Widget on our website.

And it’s awesome. Enjoy!

1 october. 2015
